item.title: Unaccountable Adam: Schiff Dodges Question About Biden Cover-Up, Hits Trump With Hypocritical Quip
RFK Jr makes Texas stop to visit family of 6-year-old measles victim, push MMR vaccine
item.description: Robert F. Kennedy Jr. made a stop in Texas on Sunday to visit the family of a 6-year-old girl who died in February after contracting the measles.

item.title: Former Second Gentleman Doug Emhoff Plays Second Fiddle As His Law Firm Bows to Trump
Sen. Mullin: Have to Address US Trade Deficits 'Now'
item.description: The time to address the trade deficits placed on the United States is "now," Sen. Markwayne Mullin, R-Okla., told Fox News Sunday.

item.description: Elon Musk said anti-Trump protesters are "puppets" who demonstrate against President Donald Trump without knowing "why they are even there."
